post.description: Puts the requesting process in the q for this lock. The corresponding node will be created in zookeeper if it did not already exist. Lock Name is the "key" of the form keyspaceName.tableName.rowId

get.description: Checks if the node is in the top of the queue and hence acquires the lock
Returns current Lock State and Holder.

delete.description: deletes the process from the zk queue
